name: Fast Brain
overview: Fast Brain is a Tetris variant. The game features three types of gameplay. The first one requires connecting four same types of bricks - diagonally or horizontally.. Second one is much faster, but requires connecting only three bricks. In addiction the player need to arrange displayed from time to time pattern in order to remove already connected bricks. The last one is a mix between first two modes. The size of the wheel is larger than in most of games of this type and requires scrolling the screen.
